data.name: AlertTitleWarning
data.comment: The title of warning alert (message box)

data.name: AppName
data.comment: The name of the application which will appear in several places arround the app.

data.name: ButtonCancel
data.comment: Cancel button title.

data.name: ButtonDone
data.comment: Done button title

data.name: ButtonLogin
data.comment: Log in button title.

data.name: ButtonLogout
data.comment: Log out button title.

data.name: ButtonSubmit
data.comment: Submit button title.

data.name: LabelCity
data.comment: City label text.

data.name: LabelCountry
data.comment: Country label text.

data.name: LabelEmail
data.comment: Email label text.

data.name: LabelFirstName
data.comment: First name label text.

data.name: LabelLastName
data.comment: Last name label text.

data.name: LabelMobilePhone
data.comment: Mobile phone label text.

data.name: LabelPriceRange
data.comment: Price range label

data.name: LabelProductDetailsCategory
data.comment: Category label shown on product details screen

data.name: LabelProductDetailsDescription
data.comment: Description label shown on product details screen

data.name: LabelProductDetailsSubcategory
data.comment: Subcategory label shown on product details screen

data.name: LabelProductDetailsTags
data.comment: Tags label shown on product details screen

data.name: LabelStartPrice
data.comment: Start price label

data.name: MenuItemProfileSettings
data.comment: Button inside side menu to acccess user profile settings (Name, Country etc.)

data.name: MessageGeneralLoading
data.comment: General loading message which may be used to show the user that something is going on in background

data.name: MessageInitialLoading
data.comment: Message shown on the bootstrap screen when loading initial data.

data.name: MessageLanguageChangeWarning
data.value: In order for language change take effect you need to restart the app.
data.comment: Warning message displayed to the user after they change their language within the app UI.

data.name: MessageLoadingFailed
data.value: Failed to load data because of unknown error. Please try again. If the issue persists please contact our support.
data.comment: Message shown to the user if general background operation failed due to unknown issue.

data.name: MessageLoadingFailedNoInternet
data.value: Data loading failed. Please make sure you have internet connection and try again.
data.comment: Message shown to the user if the data has not been loaded persumable because of no internet connection.

data.name: MessageLoadingTimeOut
data.value: Failed to load data because of timeout. Please make sure you are connected to internet and try again.
data.comment: Message shown to the user if general background operation failed due to time out.

data.name: MessageNoInternetWarning
data.comment: Warning text which usually will appear at the top of screen to warn user that there is no network connection awailable.

data.name: MessageProfileSettingsHint
data.value: Please provide some details about you to improve your app experience.
data.comment: Hint message shown at the top of profile settings screen when user signs up to the application and has not entered some details about him.

data.name: MessageSubmissionTimeoutFailure
data.value: Submission failed because of timeout. Please try again.
data.comment: Message that is shown to the user when submission failed because of timeout.

data.name: MessageSubmissionUnknownFailure
data.value: Submission failed because of unknown error. Please try again. If the issue persists please contact our support.
data.comment: Message that is shown to the user when submission failed because of unknown error.

data.name: MessageSubmitting
data.comment: Message that is shown to user when data is being submitted

data.name: PlaceholderSearchProducts
data.comment: Placeholder string shown inside search on products screen.

data.name: PlaceholderSearchStores
data.comment: Placeholder string shown inside search on stores screen.

data.name: PlaceholderSearchTags
data.comment: Placeholder string shown inside search on tags screen.

data.name: TitleFilterProducts
data.comment: Filter products page title

data.name: TitleFilterStores
data.comment: Filter stores page title

data.name: TitleProductDetails
data.comment: Product details screen title

data.name: TitleProducts
data.comment: Products page title

data.name: TitleProfileSettings
data.comment: Title of Profile Settings screen

data.name: TitleStores
data.comment: Stores page title

data.name: TitleTags
data.comment: The title of tag selection page
